title: Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) competency enhancement program in blended learning environments

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital device proficiency and basic social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Developing social domain professional competencies through blended online-offline classes in a bring-your-own-device (BYOD) environment, with continuous feedback via formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners increase online learning engagement time by over 30% by utilizing self-regulated learning strategies in a blended environment.
Learners improve error correction rates by over 40% by applying self-assessment strategies during simulation/VR-based task performance.
Learners enhance final evaluation scores by over 15% by linking psychological immersion and behavioral engagement in blended learning processes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
